alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 1:45AM CDT until March 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southern Marshall County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 145 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Willis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Durant, Colbert, Achille, Silo, Kemp, Mead, Armstrong, Hendrix, Cartwright, Woodville, Utica, Willis, Lake Texoma, Calera and Mcbride. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
